match.hoursInfo:
Updates Only
09.30 start, First Session 09.30-13.00. Interval 13.00-13.45, Second Session 13.45-17.15

commentPreTextItems.html: We apologise for the delay in updates from this match. We have been unable to get any accreditation to send journalists to Harare Sports Club and there is no television coverage available outside Zimbabwe. We were expecting coverage inside the country but it has not materialised.

stories.title: Zimbabwe v Bangladesh 2006-07
stories.subTitle: First ODI
stories.summary: Wisden's report from the first ODI between Zimbabwe and Bangladesh

stories.title: Out of sight, out of mind
stories.subTitle: Zimbabwe v Bangladesh, 1st ODI, Harare
stories.summary: The opening Zimbabwe-Bangladesh match was played out in virtual secrecy. There was no television coverage, no media updates, no live scores.  The only people who knew what was happening were the few hundred die-hards inside Harare Sports Club

stories.title: First blood to Bangladesh
stories.subTitle: Zimbabwe v Bangladesh, 1st ODI, Harare
stories.summary: Bangladesh won the opening game of the four-match series against Zimbabwe at Harare Sports Club by 45 runs, although the margin of the victory masks the fact that this was over as a contest long before the end

9.title: 5th ODI
9.statusText: Bangladesh won by 3 wickets (with 6 balls remaining)
